price: 43. Indhahoodu hoos u rogan yihiin, dulli baa dabooli; waxaana loogu yeedhi jirey inay sujuudaan iyagoo fayow(mase yeelin).
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
